COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: I put my Fortelle over my shoulder, and headed towards
the sole station in town.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: Piova was surrounded by mountains and sea, so this
was the only land route connecting it to the outside
world.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: But having said that, I hadn't left Piova once in the past
three years, so I never actually used the station myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: If I wasn't going to meet someone like Fal or Arie, as I
was today, then I had no reason to visit the remotely
located station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de
STRING: Upon arriving, I noticed that it was quite lively around
the station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea
STRING: I could see many people like me, waiting near the front
of the station for someone to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200
STRING: Just after a train arrived, people returning from
somewhere came out of the station, joyous at being
reunited with those waiting for them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: I suppose I too was one of those people who were
waiting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: [Chris] “Not much longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238
STRING: It was as if I was waiting for someone special, as I
couldn't help but look at the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e
STRING: My heart raced, as if the person that was going to be
coming out of the station was Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: Forcing those feelings down, I took a few deep breaths
and calmed myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: And then, I conveniently remembered a specific part of
one of Arie's letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: “No matter what that may be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x292
STRING: I was fully aware how ridiculous it was to use that as an
excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8
STRING: “Chris, do what you think is right.“

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: Still, I couldn't help but recall those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry to keep you waiting, it seems the train was
running late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No, it's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Fal] “...What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing, I was just thinking about something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, that habit of yours?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bc
STRING: [Chris] “Pretty much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d2
STRING: After this quick exchange, I had the feeling that Fal was
a bit tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: A long journey in the sleeping carriage must have been
tough for a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: She carried two heavy looking bags, filled with the
things she needed for her trip home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40a
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, let me carry something for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43c
STRING: [Fal] “Are you sure? Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x452
STRING: [Chris] “Don't mention it. So, shall we get going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: Taking the bag from one of her hands and slinging it
onto my shoulder, I realized that it was actually pretty
heavy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47e
STRING: The bag I was carrying appeared to be the bigger of
the two, so I assumed the one she had was lighter,
but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: [Chris] “So, are you tired?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: [Fal] “Hm...? What makes you ask that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dc
STRING: [Chris] “You look kind of tired. The sleeping carriage
isn't exactly easy to get a good rest in, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518
STRING: [Fal] “I guess so. But, I did get some sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Chris] “We can skip practice, if you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x560
STRING: [Fal] “You're just saying that because you want to take
it easy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I mean. It doesn't take much
more than a glance to tell you're tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b2
STRING: [Fal] “Oh... Well, thank you for your concern.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: [Chris] “I don't mind either way, so why don't you
decide?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: [Fal] “In that case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: Almost as if she was discussing it with her own body,
her face was slightly stern as she sank deep into
thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x626
STRING: And then a few moments later, she looked refreshed as
she spoke the answer I had been expecting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: [Fal] “Let's practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay. I had a feeling you were going to say
that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: [Fal] “Do you have your Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: [Chris] “Right here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b8
STRING: I pointed towards the Fortelle that lay at my feet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: [Fal] “Good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70e
STRING: Well then, shall we go to the school? Or would you like
to practice somewhere else?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x724
STRING: [Chris] “Not sure I want to go to school on a day off...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x756
STRING: [Fal] “But if we go to your place, Chris, doesn't that
defeat the purpose of you bringing your Fortelle?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78e
STRING: Really the only option left is my place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: I'm pretty sure that it was Fal who told me to bring my
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ba
STRING: And, she had probably anticipated that I wouldn't have
wanted to go to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d0
STRING: These were the revelations that suddenly came to mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80e
STRING: [Fal] “Alright, let's get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x824
STRING: Fal started walking, with a perpetual smile on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88c
STRING: Following Fal into her place after saying this, I found
there were two towels folded and waiting for us in the
entranceway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c6
STRING: [Fal] “Feel free to use the towels. Quite well prepared,
aren't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: [Chris] “...Were you planning for us to come here all
along?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x90e
STRING: [Fal] “Not exactly. I'm just glad they didn't go unused.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: While I was wiping my hair and clothes down with the
nicely scented towel, Fal had gone into her place and
gotten a rather familiar looking score from out of her
bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x944
STRING: [Chris] “Did you take that home with you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95a
STRING: I folded up the towel I had used, and placed it on the
table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x982
STRING: [Fal] “Just so I wouldn't forget the feel of it. But actually,
I've memorized the whole thing, and can recall it
without even looking...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ac
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9de
STRING: [Fal] “I think it's just because it's something I've looked
at so many times. I feel at peace when I have it with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fe
STRING: Thanks to the notes and annotations written all over it,
the score probably looked messy and hard to read for
someone first laying eyes on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa14
STRING: But for Fal, who had practiced and practiced and
mastered everything she had written on the score, it
was almost like a special partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa34
STRING: So for Fal to feel at peace when she had it with her was
not surprising at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Chris] “I know what you mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: [Chris] “I guess the fact you've gotten that out means...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab0
STRING: [Fal] “Are you ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac6
STRING: [Chris] “...I shall set up posthaste!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: [Fal] “Very well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb34
STRING: Her voice sounded as if it had become even more
radiant than before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4a
STRING: I could tell just from hearing her sing that she hadn't
missed a single day of practice since returning home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb60
STRING: Of course, if you knew her well enough, you would have
no cause to doubt that, even without hearing her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb78
STRING: As for me, I had also used my Fortelle every day, so my
skills definitely hadn't lost their edge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8e
STRING: It was none other than Phorni that I had been practicing
with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: It practically didn't matter that Fal and I hadn't
rehearsed together for over a week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb2
STRING: And on top of that, there was one thing I was able to
realize, having spent more time hearing Phorni's voice
than I usually did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: I was able to feel that “something” in Fal's voice that she
previously didn't have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: I could tell that whatever it was that Phorni and Fal
herself had thought she was lacking, was now present
in her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: Just like when Phorni was singing, I could feel her
unwavering voice and flowing presence through my
skin.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: I wonder what happened during the time we had been
apart?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc24
STRING: Or was it simply something that fixed itself naturally
through the passing of time?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3c
STRING: I unconsciously began to play the Fortelle as I thought
about these things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Fal] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: After we finished playing our song once, Fal let out a
heavy sigh that showed she was tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: [Chris] “Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, yes. It seems I'm a little tired after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: Perhaps she had given up trying to force herself, and
instead sat down in a nearby chair and took a deep
breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: Despite the fact that she herself said she was okay, I
could tell at a glance that she wasn't in good condition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: Just when I was wondering if I should check on her
again, she moved first and asked me a question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd82
STRING: [Fal] “So, what did you think of my singing today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd98
STRING: [Chris] “...I think you know the answer to that without
me telling you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdae
STRING: I suppose if I was to give a one word answer, it would
be “superb.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: But if I actually said it, it would sound like it wasn't true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: And besides, in the end it was only the audience who
could give an accurate evaluation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: [Fal] “What did you think when you listened to me sing,
Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe04
STRING: [Chris] “If I give you my honest opinion, will you promise
not to take it as flattery?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Fal] “That almost sounds like flattery already...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: [Chris] “I thought you sounded good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe76
STRING: Upon answering in a serious tone, Fal stopped laughing,
and waited in earnest for the words I would say next.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8c
STRING: [Chris] “You once said that you were lacking something,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Fal] “...Yes. You sensed that too, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: [Chris] “At that time, yes. But today, not so much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Fal] “...Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: I nodded silently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1e
STRING: I figured that if I said any more than this, and added
extra sugar to the cake, it would gradually begin to
sound untrue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: Thus, I silently let her know that I was speaking
truthfully and seriously, and not trying to simply win her
favor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf66
STRING: [Fal] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7c
STRING: Practicing any more than this today might end up
having the opposite effect.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf88
STRING: Feeling this, I started to pack up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb0
STRING: [Fal] “Ah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc6
STRING: [Chris] “Let's continue our rehearsals tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff8
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100e
STRING: [Chris] “I should probably make this clear first, but I
didn't say that just because I want to give myself a rest,
okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Fal] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: We had only been here for a short time, and since Fal
had begun our rehearsal immediately, I got packed up
and ready to leave in the blink of an eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1094
STRING: My Fortelle on my shoulders, I spoke to Fal, who was
still resting in her chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10aa
STRING: [Chris] “So, I was wondering, did something happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d4
STRING: My question was supposed to be tactfully casual, but
Fal widened her eyes in response to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fe
STRING: From that reaction I knew that something had indeed
happened, but I was not sure what it was, and I was
unable to ask.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: [Chris] “If nothing happened, then it's all good. Well, get
some rest, and we'll rehearse again tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115a
STRING: [Fal] “Sure. Let me see you off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, you don't have to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: By the time I answered, Fal had already stood up and
walked as far as the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: I followed behind her, and reached out for the door
before she could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b2
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, this is far enough. We've got rehearsals
starting tomorrow, but what's the plan?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ee
STRING: [Fal] “Let's see... We don't have any private classes now
that the New Year has started.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120e
STRING: [Chris] “From midday, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1240
STRING: [Fal] “First thing in the morning... Would be too mean
to do to you, so why don't we start at the time you
would normally have had a private lesson with Ms.
Cordell?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1260
STRING: [Chris] “From ten o'clock... That should be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: [Fal] “Don't be late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c0
STRING: Hey, speaking of Ms. Cordell, I just remembered
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh wait, she wanted to hear us play at some
point, didn't she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1308
STRING: [Fal] “She did. Shall we try doing that tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, we probably should. If that's the case,
make sure to get a good rest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135a
STRING: [Fal] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1370
STRING: Usually this kind of thing went the other way around,
but Fal nodded without complaining.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1386
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b8
STRING: [Fal] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: When I went to turn to doorknob, Fal let out a small
voice, as if she had something to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e4
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1402
STRING: [Fal] “Could I... Ask you just one thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1418
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144a
STRING: [Fal] “Does my singing...have any value?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1460
STRING: [Chris] “Value...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: [Fal] “I sometimes wonder if I'm actually capable of
becoming a professional singer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: I let go of the doorknob, and turned to face her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: Realizing this, an almost angry expression crept onto
Fal's face for an instant, and then she looked at the
ground.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: However, it seemed that it was not towards me, but
herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fc
STRING: [Fal] “Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1512
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, uhh... I'm not really confident I'll be able
to word it right, so I'll just keep this simple.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1548
STRING: [Chris] “It does, and you are. You have the talent for it,
and you've earned it too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: As I finished up, I smiled to Fal, who was still standing
silently in place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a6
STRING: [Chris] “See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15bc
STRING: Her response was a little slow, but she did it with a faint
smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ee
STRING: [Fal] “See you then.”
